text: David Lambert (7 July 1939 – 2016) was a Welsh footballer who played as a left-back. He played in the English football league for Wrexham, and also played for Cardiff City, although made no appearances at the latter. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Welsh footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Druids United F.C. players Category:Cardiff City F.C. players Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:Oswestry Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:People from Ruabon
title: David Lambert (footballer)
